items.content_html: ModularORM is a lightweight and flexible TypeScript ORM library that enables seamless interaction with databases using predefined classes and interfaces. It simplifies development while maintaining flexibility and control over your project.

items.content_html: The Vanilla Calendar Pro is a versatile JavaScript date and time picker component with TypeScript support, making it compatible with any JavaScript frameworks and libraries. It is designed to be lightweight, easy to use, and feature-rich, without relying on external dependencies.
items.title: uvarov-frontend/vanilla-calendar-pro: The Vanilla Calendar Pro is a versatile JavaScript date and time picker component with TypeScript support, making it compatible with any JavaScript frameworks and libraries. It is designed to be lightweight, easy to use, and feature-rich, without relying on external dependencies.

items.content_html: A simple, lightweight Notes app built with React, allowing users to add and delete notes. The app uses React state for local storage, without any external database.
items.title: Aditya-Acharya12/keeper-notes: A simple, lightweight Notes app built with React, allowing users to add and delete notes. The app uses React state for local storage, without any external database.

items.content_html: A lightweight RAG for embedding and querying codebases. This service allows users to download GitHub repositories, process their code, store it in a vector database, and query it using natural language to retrieve relevant code snippets. Perfect for building intelligent code search and analysis tools.
items.title: hashir-ayaz/codebase-rag: A lightweight RAG for embedding and querying codebases. This service allows users to download GitHub repositories, process their code, store it in a vector database, and query it using natural language to retrieve relevant code snippets. Perfect for building intelligent code search and analysis tools.

items.content_html: A complete setup for building a cross-platform desktop application using React (frontend), Vite (development tooling), Node.js (backend), and Electron (desktop environment). This project serves as a template for developers looking to build modern desktop applications with a lightweight backend.
items.title: rahil1202/electron-react-vite-template: A complete setup for building a cross-platform desktop application using React (frontend), Vite (development tooling), Node.js (backend), and Electron (desktop environment). This project serves as a template for developers looking to build modern desktop applications with a lightweight backend.

items.content_html: This is a lightweight JavaScript-based spreadsheet application with support for basic arithmetic operations, custom functions, and dynamic cell references. It provides functionality similar to spreadsheets like Excel or Google Sheets, enabling users to perform calculations and evaluate formulas.
items.title: kaushalpandey1510/spreadsheet: This is a lightweight JavaScript-based spreadsheet application with support for basic arithmetic operations, custom functions, and dynamic cell references. It provides functionality similar to spreadsheets like Excel or Google Sheets, enabling users to perform calculations and evaluate formulas.

items.content_html: Netlify/Decap CMS alternative. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support among hundreds of improvements. Open source & free. Made with Svelte.
items.title: sveltia/sveltia-cms: Netlify/Decap CMS alternative. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support among hundreds of improvements. Open source & free. Made with Svelte.
